name: Behind Blue Eyes
author: Limp Bizkit
text:
[Em]No one knows what [G]it's like, to be the [D]bad man,
To be the [C]sad man, [A]behind blue eyes
[Em]No one knows what [G]it's like to be [D]hated,
To be [C]fated, to telling [A]only lies
 
But my [C]dreams,[D] they aren't as [G]empty,
As my [C]conscience[D] seems to [E]be
I have [Bm7]hours, only[C] lonely
My love is [D]vengeance that's never [Asus2]free 

[Em]No one knows what [G]it's like to feel these [Dsus2]feelings
Like I [C]do, and I blame [Asus2]you
[Em]No one bites back as [G]hard on their [Dsus2]anger
None of my [C]pain and woe, can show [Asus2]through
 
But my [C]dreams,[D] they aren't as [G]empty,
As my [C]conscience[D] seems to [E]be
I have [Bm7]hours, only[C] lonely
My love is [D]vengeance that's never [Asus2]free 

[Em]No one knows what [G]it's like
To be mistreated[Dsus2] , to be [C]defeated
[Asus2]Behind blue eyes
[Em]No one knows how to [G]say
That they're [Dsus2]sorry and don't [C]worry
I'm not telling [Asus2]lies
 
But my [C]dreams,[D] they aren't as [G]empty,
As my [C]conscience[D] seems to [E]be
I have [Bm7]hours, only[C] lonely
My love is [D]vengeance that's never [Asus2]free 
 
[Em]No one knows what [G]it's like, to be the [D]bad man,
To be the [C]sad man, [A]behind blue eyes
